snippet.title:
Could The Next X-Men Movie Herald Days of Future Past?
Lots of movie comics news today. Bleeding Cool is reporting that 20th Century Fox have secured the name Days of Future Past in connection with the next X-Men: First Class movie.
For those who aren't familiar with the comics, Days of Future Past was the name of a two part X-Men story in 1981 which became a central part of X-Men lore. It introduced a dystopian future in which the X-Men have been outlawed and hunted down almost to extinction.
*Source:* http://www.bleedingcool.com/2012/06/05/x-men-sequel-headed-towards-days-of-future-past/﻿
